fields_of_interest: Single market, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Borders and Security, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: The ECA follows all legislative work, consultation processes and events / conferences linked to EU cloud policy, such as: data protection, including ePrivacy, lawful access to data, cybersecurity, FinTech, data flows.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication:
The ECA's communications are all available under this page: https://www.europeancloudalliance.com/updates/  
as well as on our Twitter feed: https://twitter.com/CloudAllianceEu
goals__remit:
The European Cloud Alliance is dedicated to supporting and promoting successful use of the cloud in Europe. 
 
The European Cloud Alliance provides a powerful voice for promotion, a sharp focus for advocacy and represents the entire cloud value chain. We welcome any European organisation that views the cloud as a route to growth and innovation. Equally welcome are developers and software vendors creating value through the cloud. Our work is organised on the principle that increased trust in the cloud will accelerate its usage in Europe.
